wikipedia_page.main: Gary Savage (born 1970 in Ballycran, County Down) is an Irish sportsman. He played hurling with his local club Ballycran and was a member of the Down senior inter-county team from the 1990s until the 2000s.

response: * Gary Savage (cricketer) (born 1978), South African-born Argentine cricketer
